<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">6427eb29c306b5509d0a212ad00131da</macroponent><name>select_2/items</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    const data = api.data.organizations.results;
    if (data && data.length) {
        return data.map(td => ({
            id: td.sys_id.value,
            label: td.package_name.value
        }));
    }
    return [];
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-24 02:39:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>d74960cac30ef5509d0a212ad0013148</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>select_2/items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="WoltersKluwer Document Generation" source="x_snc_woltersklu_0">5b276de7c3d5bd109d0a212ad00131c8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="WoltersKluwer Document Generation">5b276de7c3d5bd109d0a212ad00131c8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_d74960cac30ef5509d0a212ad0013148</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-24 02:39:40</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
